articles.title: Emergency in Sri Lanka, Nepal, Pak forex dips, South Asia in crisis - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sri Lanka crisis: The worsening economic situation in Sri Lankan, Nepal and Pakistan is a challenge to India as rising public resentment could fuel political instability with no instant economic vaccine available and long recovery ahead. | World News

articles.author: Mihir Vasavda
articles.title: Hangzhou Asian Games postponed after fresh Covid wave in China - The Indian Express
articles.description: The decision comes at a time when China, where the virus emerged in late 2019, is experiencing its biggest Covid-19 outbreak.
articles.content: The Asian Games, which were to be held from September 10-25 in Hangzhou, have been postponed due to the pandemic, Chinas state media reported on Friday. No alternative date has been announced so far.… [+2369 chars]
